# Getting Started

This app has been created following [this article](https://dev.to/francescoxx/java-crud-rest-api-using-spring-boot-hibernate-postgres-docker-and-docker-compose-5cln)

## For debugging app

- Up the DB `make up-db`
- Up the app running the `JavaApiApplication.run`
